pages.title: Minke Whale
pages.text: The common minke whale or northern minke whale ($(o)Balaenoptera acutorostrata$()) is a species of minke whale within the suborder of baleen whales.$(br2)It is the smallest species of the rorquals and the second smallest species of baleen whale.

pages.title: Minke Whale
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 1$(br2)Growth time: 12 Days
